page.title: 17The Racecourse
page.content:
Horse boxes arrive,unload and park A happy bustle,people crying "'Starbright' sure to win!" "No he won't,dandy will" Bookies overwhelmed by money Hoping 'Starbright' the favorite wont win.
The gate goes up,off they go Someone yells here they come! This is the moment they have been waiting for And over the finishing line comes starbright. The bookies sigh. They won't make millionaires of themselves today.
The horse boxes go home all loaded with tired hoses the punters slowly disappear and go home broke
